translation.zh: ‎有一支来自俄克拉荷马的分队

translation.en: composed of Mexican-Americans, Native Americans and Dust Bowl cowboys,
translation.zh:
‎他们由墨西哥裔美国人
‎美国原住民和尘暴区牛仔组成

translation.en: most of whom couldn't drink together in the same bars back home,
translation.zh:
‎其中大多数人在种族隔离的美国故土
‎恐怕都无法在同家酒吧一起喝酒

translation.en: landed in Sicily and began a brutal 500-day trek through Nazi-occupied Europe.
translation.zh:
‎但他们一起登陆了西西里 ‎开始了穿行纳粹所占欧洲地区的
‎500日残酷跋涉

translation.en: This is the story of those men.
How the hell can Coldfoot see anything? I can't even see my fuckin' boots.
translation.zh:
‎科德福特怎么能看见东西？
‎我他妈连自己靴子都看不见

translation.en: -What's he lookin' at? -He's looking at the fog.
The fog? What the fuck does that mean? We can all see the fog.
translation.zh:
‎雾？这他妈什么意思？
‎我们都看得到雾

translation.en: Just make sure you can see him.
-Spigs, get down! -I'm tryin'! Ah! Shit! I'm hit. Fuck!
translation.zh:
‎-小斯皮格 卧倒！
‎-我在努力 可恶 我中枪了 操！

translation.en: Two Panzers, four platoons of infantry, 500 yards ahead.
translation.zh:
‎两辆德军坦克 四个排的步兵
‎前方457米

translation.en: All right. Let's go, Nagles, come on!
translation.zh: ‎好了 我们走 内格斯 走！

translation.en: No, no, no! Don't go under the trees. Stay out in the open!
translation.zh: ‎别！不要去树下 留在开阔地

translation.en: Garcia, Rosa, check out that barn.
translation.zh: ‎加西亚 罗沙 检查那个谷仓

translation.en: They fell back two miles south and they're still moving.
translation.zh: ‎他们往南退了3.2公里 仍在行动中

translation.en: Six dead or missing. At least ten wounded.
translation.zh: ‎六人死亡或失踪 至少十人负伤

translation.en: I wanna know where the Germans are sleeping tonight.
translation.zh: ‎我想知道德军今晚在哪里歇脚

translation.en: He was hiding in the barn, sir. He won't shut up.
translation.zh: ‎他躲在谷仓里 长官 不肯闭嘴

translation.en: We need Spigs to tell us what the hell he's saying.
translation.zh: ‎得让小斯皮格翻译他到底在说什么

translation.en: Found this in his hiding place.
translation.zh: ‎在他躲藏的地方找到了这个

translation.en: [in Italian] Give me it. Give me it. Give me it. Give me it.
All right, get him inside. Get some food in him.
translation.zh: ‎带他进去 给他一些吃的

translation.en: [man] Spigliani. -[in Italian] Do you speak Italian? -Yes.
translation.zh:
‎-斯皮格列尼 你会意大利语？
‎-会

translation.en: [in Boston accent] Park the car in Harvard Yard.
Where did you learn to swim, Private Spigliani?
translation.zh:
‎二等兵斯皮格列尼
‎你在哪里学的游泳？

translation.en: How the hell do you know that?
I was a graduate student at MIT.
translation.zh: ‎我是麻省理工学院的研究生

translation.en: I lived on Maple, near the intersection of 4th.
translation.zh: ‎我住在梅普街 靠近第4街的路口
‎斯巴奇·哈梅尔的妹妹 是啊

translation.en: -It's a small world, isn't it? -You can say that again.
translation.zh:
‎-世界真小 不是吗？
‎-可不是嘛
‎还有来自波士顿的意大利佬？
‎是啊 来自俄克拉荷马的157团

translation.en: I got attached at Salerno as an interpreter.
translation.zh: ‎我作为口译员来到了萨莱诺

translation.en: And their leader, he is an Indian, too?

translation.zh: ‎他是个牛仔 来自亚利桑那

translation.en: Things must be getting desperate in America
translation.zh: ‎这些人居然能加入你们军队

translation.en: if they're allowing these types into your army.
Red men and Mexicans. Inferior races.
translation.zh: ‎土著佬和墨西哥佬 次等种族
‎我去过俄克拉荷马 下士

translation.en: and the bars have signs out front that say…

translation.zh: ‎“印第安人与墨西哥人不得入内”

translation.en: They make their Negroes there drink from separate water fountains.
translation.zh: ‎他们让黑人用不同的饮水器喝水

translation.en: So don't tell me they're Americans just like you.
translation.zh:
‎所以别跟我说
‎他们都是和你一样的美国人

translation.en: To fight for a country where you can't even enjoy a beer…
translation.zh:
‎连自己都不能在同一间酒吧
‎跟自己的战友喝酒

translation.en: at the same bar as your fellow soldier.
translation.zh: ‎这样的国家 他们竟然还为之战斗

translation.en: So… please now tell me about the ponds.
Yes, I need to know what you did about the ponds.
translation.zh: ‎对 我要知道你们对礁做了什么

translation.en: What ponds? I don't know what the hell you're talking about.
translation.zh: ‎什么礁？我不知道你在说什么

translation.en: -What did you do with the ponds! -We didn't see any fucking ponds.
translation.zh:
‎-告诉我你们对礁做了什么
‎-我们他妈没看到什么礁

translation.en: -You're lying! -Jesus Christ, I'm telling you the truth.
translation.zh:
‎-你撒谎
‎-天啊 我说的是实话

translation.en: Your company crossed three ponds in two days.
translation.zh: ‎你们连队两天内穿过了三座礁

translation.en: What are the conditions of those ponds?
Ponte. Br-- Bridges. You're talking about bridges.
I used the Italian word, didn't I?
translation.zh: ‎我用的是意大利语 是不是？

translation.en: What are the conditions of those bridges?
We didn't touch the bridges. They're all there.
translation.zh: ‎我们没碰那些桥 它们都还在

translation.en: The war for you is over.
translation.zh: ‎对你而言 战争已经结束

translation.en: You may even get to enjoy swimming in Charlestown again.
translation.zh: ‎你甚至还能再在查尔斯镇尽情游泳

translation.en: But by this time tomorrow, your cowboy and Indian friends will all be dead.
translation.zh:
‎但到了明天这个时候
‎你的牛仔和印第安朋友都会死光

translation.en: The kid's looking at the photos on your gun.
translation.zh: ‎那孩子在盯着你枪上的照片

translation.en: [in Italian] I have no family. Everyone is dead.
translation.zh: ‎我没有家人 所有人都死了

‎-天 这里有人会意大利语吗？
‎-有

translation.en: We, uh, we got that part.
[in English] He says his, um, mother and father died.
He's been living here with his grandfather. Till he died.
translation.zh:
‎他一直跟爷爷住在这里
‎直到爷爷也死了

translation.en: He's been hiding from the Germans for the last month.
translation.zh: ‎过去一个月他一直在躲避德军

translation.en: We lost them, sir. They're using the rain to screen their movements.
translation.zh:
‎我们跟丢了他们 长官
‎他们用雨来遮掩行动

translation.en: Ask him if he knows where the Germans are.
translation.zh: ‎问问他是否知道德军在哪里

translation.en: Well, he's scared as shit, man.
-Jesus, Gomez, what did you do to him? -I didn't do anything.
translation.zh:
‎-天啊 戈麦斯 你对他做了什么？
‎-我什么都没做啊

translation.en: Ah, the Germans, man. They told him that first we were gonna feed him
translation.zh:
‎那些德军跟他说
‎我们会先给他喂点吃的

translation.en: and then we were gonna do it to him.
Hey, man, tell him we're not interested.
-Tell him we already bagged our limit. -Tell him they're too small.
translation.zh:
‎-跟他说我们已经收割够多了
‎-跟他说他蛋蛋太小了

translation.en: Tell him the Germans aren't coming back.
Sir, are you sure you want me to tell him that?
translation.zh: ‎长官 确定要我那样跟他说吗？

translation.en: are the grandsons of the greatest Indian warriors
translation.zh: ‎都是曾经纵横美洲大平原的
‎最伟大的印第安战士的后人

translation.en: They've killed mountain lion, hunted buffalo.
translation.zh: ‎他们杀过美洲狮 捕过大水牛

translation.en: they're the descendants of the powerful Mexican army
translation.zh: ‎他们是曾经在五月五日击败法军的

translation.en: that defeated the French on Cinco de Mayo.
who brought the rule of law
to places where only killers and thieves lived before.
translation.zh:
‎给曾经只住着凶手窃贼的地方
‎带来了法治

translation.en: Tell him the Nazis are never gonna hurt him again.
translation.zh: ‎跟他说 纳粹再也伤害不了他

translation.en: Because tomorrow, we're gonna find 'em and stop 'em.
translation.zh: ‎因为明天我们会找到他们 了结他们

translation.en: There now. Doesn't that feel better?
translation.zh: ‎好了 这样是不是好多了？

translation.en: No man should have to walk around covering his privates.
He actually made the kid believe we could do it.
translation.zh: ‎他真的让孩子认为我们能做到

translation.en: Wasn't the kid he was convincing.
translation.zh: ‎他要说服的人不是那个孩子

translation.en: A gift from our young friend.
translation.zh: ‎这份礼物来自我们的小朋友

translation.en: It was his grandfather's. He wants you to have it.
translation.zh: ‎以前是他爷爷用的 他想送给你

translation.en: I cut down the barrel to make it more practical.
translation.zh: ‎我削短了枪管 让它更实用

translation.en: He also told me where the Germans are.

translation.zh:
‎-外面注意安全
‎-再见了 孩子

translation.en: Watch the grass in the middle.

translation.zh: ‎德军坦克 两点钟方向 45米

translation.en: -We need to take him to a field hospital. -Hold this.
translation.zh:
‎-我们得带他去战地医院
‎-按住这里

translation.en: [in English] All right. Hang in there. Hang in there. Stay still. Come on!
-Get him outta here. Now! -Here we go. Come on. Get him up.
translation.zh:
‎-带他离开这里 快！
‎-好 来 抬他起来
‎大家对火奴鲁鲁过誉了 长官

translation.en: Finished a stint in Hawaii, then three years of college.
translation.zh:
‎在夏威夷当了一阵子兵
‎之后上了三年大学

translation.en: I ran out of money, sir.
Give the Army another couple of years, then go back and graduate.
translation.zh: ‎在部队再待上几年 然后回学校毕业

translation.en: You did hear there might be a war on the horizon?
translation.zh: ‎你听说短期可能会发生战争了吧？

translation.en: I caught wind of that, yes, sir.
If that happens, we're gonna need every good officer we can get our hands on.
translation.zh:
‎要是开战的话
‎我们得用上能找到的所有好军官

translation.en: If that happens, I intend to be one of them, sir.
translation.zh:
‎要是开战的话
‎我打算成为其中一员 长官

translation.en: What got you in the Army in the first place?
I had to leave home when I was 17.
Hunted all over the west for work,
ended up skinny and starving in San Francisco.
Army recruiter bought me a meal,
said that if I signed up, I'd get three just like it every day.
translation.zh:
‎说如果我报名入伍
‎每天都会有那样子的三餐

translation.en: Your previous CO said you're good at handling problems.
translation.zh: ‎你之前的指挥官说你善于处理问题

translation.en: Well, I've got one. One of my companies, J Company,
translation.zh:
‎我手上就有个问题
‎我的一个连队 J连

translation.en: has failed every live fire test for the past three months.
translation.zh: ‎过去三个月 每次实弹演习都不合格

translation.en: -Do you think you can shape them up? -Yes, sir.
translation.zh:
‎-你能让他们提高吗？
‎-可以 长官

translation.en: -I'm looking for J Company. -Uh, over there.
[Gomez] Turn off that fucking gringo music.
translation.zh: ‎白人佬的音乐难听死了 关掉

translation.en: -Um, Lt. Danalli, sir. -Lt. Danalli is now relieved.
translation.zh:
‎-达纳利中尉 长官
‎-达纳利中尉已经卸任

translation.en: My name is Sparks. I want a list of all prisoners and charges.
translation.zh:
‎我叫斯巴克斯
‎我要一张单子 列出所有犯人和罪行

translation.en: We get a lot of that in here.
The Indians and the Mexicans don't like each other much.
translation.zh: ‎印第安人和墨西哥人彼此看不顺眼

translation.en: And they both hate us more.
There's a river down there, the Caheesh.
It's the best in the world.

translation.zh: ‎蒙大拿州威尔萨尔 牧羊的地方

translation.en: What do you do about the wolves?
Who the hell gave you that?
Shit, I don't want you. I want him.
translation.zh: ‎妈呀 我不想要你 我想要他

translation.en: The fact that I'm talking to you in a jailhouse
translation.zh: ‎现在我是在监狱里跟你们说话

translation.en: tells me you didn't get on well with your previous COs.
translation.zh:
‎说明你们跟自己的前任指挥官
‎相处不怎么好

translation.en: Maybe you were told you're too stupid for this army.
translation.zh:
‎也许有人对你们说
‎你们太笨 不适合这支部队

translation.en: Maybe you were told you got a problem with authority or…
translation.zh: ‎也许有人对你们说 你们不服从权威

translation.en: you were told you come from a race…
that's got no business wearing the uniform.
Whatever you've been told doesn't mean shit to me.
translation.zh:
‎无论之前他们对你们说了什么
‎我完全不在乎

translation.en: There's a live fire test at the end of the week.
translation.zh: ‎本周结束时有一场实弹演习

translation.en: and you can enjoy a weekend of freedom.
translation.zh: ‎那就能享受一个自由的周末

translation.en: Forty-eight hours, not only outside this cage…
translation.zh: ‎48个小时 不仅可以离开这个牢笼
‎这份待遇必须要靠你们争取

translation.en: that you and the US Army have reached the end of your journey together,
translation.zh: ‎你和美国军队已经走到了尽头

translation.en: But if you want the chance to prove
that everything that every asshole ever said about you is wrong…
translation.zh:
‎之前所有混蛋
‎对你说的那些话都是错的…

translation.en: you got two minutes to lace up and join me outside.
translation.zh:
‎那就整理衣装
‎两分钟后到外面见我

translation.en: Shall we give them another minute, sir?
translation.zh: ‎要再给他们一分钟吗 长官？

translation.en: It doesn't take another minute to figure this out.

translation.zh:
‎-让他们列队
‎-你刚刚是在哄骗我

translation.en: or can you really get us off-post?
Only if the whole group passes.
-What's the story with Coldfoot? -What story, sir?
translation.zh:
‎-科德福特是什么情况？
‎-你指什么 长官？

translation.en: He's been in the Army over three years. Why is he still a private?
translation.zh: ‎他参军三年多了 怎么还是二等兵？
‎科德福特被降级了 长官

translation.en: He used to be corporal. Up for a promotion to sergeant.
translation.zh: ‎他曾是下士 有资格晋升为中士

translation.en: and it ended in a big fight.
He got in a fight because he was denied promotion?
translation.zh: ‎他因为晋升失败就跟人打架？

translation.en: It was his third rejection, sir.
translation.zh: ‎那是他第三次被拒绝了 长官

translation.en: Coldfoot is an Indian with pride, Lieutenant.
translation.zh:
‎科德福特是个
‎很有自尊心的印第安人 中尉

translation.en: It's… it's not a very "healthy combination around here.
translation.zh: ‎在这里 印第安人有自尊心不是好事

translation.en: [master sergeant] No wonder you feather-heads lost all your land.
translation.zh:
‎怪不得你们这些羽毛土著人
‎丢掉了所有土地

translation.en: Here I thought it was 'cause you couldn't hold your liquor.
translation.zh: ‎我本来以为是因为你们酒量不行

translation.en: But all this time, it was 'cause you couldn't shoot worth a fuck.
translation.zh:
‎但这段时间我明白了
‎那是因为你们枪法跟屎一样

translation.en: What mojado taught you to fire a gun, Gomez?
translation.zh: ‎是哪个湿背佬教你打枪的 戈麦斯？
‎是你那在地里摘瓜的妈妈吗？

translation.en: You got a problem with something, boy?
will you look who's back, boys?

translation.zh: ‎下士…我是说 二等兵缺德福特

translation.en: I thought we got rid of you, prairie nigger.
translation.zh:
‎我还以为
‎我们已经摆脱你了呢 土著佬

translation.en: Trust me, it is just a matter of time--
translation.zh: ‎相信我 这只是时间问题…

translation.en: Master Sergeant, can my men get a little more of your instruction
translation.zh: ‎军士长 你能不能给我的人多点指导

translation.en: and a little less of your commentary?
I forgot you're new around here.
See, this here is my firing range.
That means when your men step onto my range,
translation.zh: ‎也就是说 你的人进入了我的靶场

translation.en: That's funny, Sergeant, 'cause the way I see it is…
translation.zh: ‎有意思了 军士长 因为在我看来

translation.en: when I bring my men onto your range…

translation.zh: ‎你就变成了他们的指导老师

translation.en: So far, all they've gotten from you is a dissertation on their diets
translation.zh:
‎到目前为止他们也就只听到
‎你长篇大论谈他们的饮食

translation.en: and the sexual habits of their mothers, so…
how about doing a little work?
a man don't toss words around like that…
unless he's willing to back them up.
What goes on behind that shed
translation.zh: ‎那件小屋后面无论发生什么

translation.en: You'd better start thinking how you're gonna explain these bruises, sir.
translation.zh:
‎你最好开始想想
‎要怎么解释你身上的淤青吧

translation.en: Fair warning, boys. You go back there, you'll have company.
translation.zh:
‎提醒一句 各位
‎要是你们去到屋后 我们也会去

translation.en: I was wondering how I was gonna explain that.
Shall we pick up where we left off, gentlemen?
-Best scores of any group. -Thank you, sir.
translation.zh:
‎-所有团队当中最高分
‎-谢谢 长官

translation.en: We credit the master sergeant with our success.
translation.zh: ‎我们的成功要归功于军士长

translation.en: Excellent work, Master Sergeant. Sorry to hear about your little accident.
translation.zh:
‎非常不错 军士长
‎很遗憾听到你发生了小意外

‎-带下一团队进来
‎-是 长官

translation.en: There's a problem with Coldfoot. He's going into town.
translation.zh: ‎科德福特有问题 他要进城了

translation.en: -Yeah, he's got a pass. -It's where he's going that's a problem.
translation.zh:
‎-没事 他得到了准许
‎-问题在于他要去的地方

translation.en: They'll only call the MPs, have you thrown in jail.
translation.zh:
‎他们只会把宪兵叫来
‎把你扔进监狱

translation.en: That nothing in this army leads to anything good.
translation.zh: ‎证明这支军队里就没什么好事

translation.en: What if I told you I'd put you up for sergeant this week?
translation.zh: ‎要是我说下周让你准备晋升中士呢？

translation.en: No offense, Lieutenant, but I've been up for sergeant before.
translation.zh:
‎恕我直言 中尉
‎但我之前已有过晋升中士的资格

translation.en: You wait and wait and then they give you an excuse and tell you no.
translation.zh:
‎一直等一直等
‎然后他们给个借口就拒绝了

translation.en: -I ain't waiting anymore. -You don't have to.
Get in the car, Sergeant Coldfoot.
The shrapnel went through your abdomen and sliced open your liver.
translation.zh:
‎弹片刺穿了你的腹部
‎割开了你的肝脏

translation.en: -You wanna tell me what the lucky part is? -You should be dead.
translation.zh:
‎-你要告诉我这哪里幸运吗？
‎-你本来应该没命了

translation.en: Quick action by your men saved your life.
translation.zh: ‎你手下的迅速行动救了你的命

translation.en: If you ever see them again, I suggest taking them out for a steak dinner.
translation.zh:
‎要是你再见到他们
‎我建议你请他们吃牛排大餐

translation.en: when do I go back to Italy?
Your combat days are over, Captain.
translation.zh: ‎你的战斗时日已经结束 上尉

translation.en: Next stop for you is home.
Congratulations, Captain. You've got a million-dollar wound.
translation.zh:
‎恭喜你 上尉
‎你这伤口犹如中了百万彩票

translation.en: With winter setting in, the fighting south of Rome continues.
translation.zh: ‎冬天来临 罗马南边的战况继续

translation.en: Allied troops are dug in, waiting for the next German counterattack,
translation.zh:
‎同盟国部队掘壕固守
‎等待德军下一次反击

translation.en: The going is tough, but so are our boys.
translation.zh: ‎战况艰难 但我们的战士也不弱

translation.en: Ask any one of them and they'll tell you
translation.zh: ‎随便问问其中一位战士 他们都会说

translation.en: it'll take a lot more than a little rain and mud
translation.zh: ‎一点点雨水 一点点泥泞

translation.en: to get these GI Joes down.
translation.zh: ‎远远无法打倒这些美国大兵

translation.en: I need transportation, Captain. I'm not that damn particular. You'll do.
translation.zh:
‎我需要交通运输 上尉
‎我这人不挑剔 你就行了

translation.en: Okay, now that you've seen it…
I'm thirsty. Let's get a drink.
translation.zh: ‎我口渴了 咱们去喝一杯吧

translation.en: It happened a week after you were wounded.
translation.zh: ‎这是你受伤一周后发生的事

translation.en: It threw me 20 feet in the air, took off everything below the knee.
translation.zh:
‎把我在空中抛出六米多
‎膝盖以下都废了

translation.en: in this war, getting promoted is easy.
translation.zh: ‎在这场战争里 晋升很容易

translation.en: The hard part is staying alive.
They're stuck on the Gustav Line south of Cassino.
translation.zh:
‎他们困在古斯塔夫防线上
‎卡辛诺山南边

translation.en: It's cold, wet and shitty. They're hangin' tough.
translation.zh: ‎又冷又湿 环境恶劣 他们顽强不屈

translation.en: Who'd you send in for me?
He's not you, but he's okay.
translation.zh: ‎虽然比不上你 但也还行

translation.en: [sighs] When are they, uh, sending you home, sir?
translation.zh: ‎他们什么时候送你回家 长官？

translation.en: I was going to offer to take any letters back for you,
translation.zh: ‎我本来想着可以帮你带信回去

translation.en: but I hear that won't be necessary.
I feel I should be in Italy. I oughta be with my men.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得我应当在意大利
‎应该在我的手下身边

translation.en: Go home, Felix. Go home to Mary.
translation.zh: ‎回家吧 菲利斯 回到玛丽身边

translation.en: See your son, raise more babies.
translation.zh: ‎看看你的儿子 养育更多宝宝

translation.en: I've never been a good letter writer, so I don't know if I can explain this.
translation.zh:
‎我从来都不大会写信
‎所以不知道我能否解释清楚

translation.en: Hell, I'm not sure I can explain it even to myself.
translation.zh: ‎我都不确定能否对自己解释清楚

translation.en: When I left you to come over here,
translation.zh: ‎在我离开你 来到这里时

translation.en: I was scared of losing you.
There's an Army captain out there.
He wants to hitch a ride back to Italy.
translation.zh: ‎他想让我们顺便载他回意大利

translation.en: [Sparks] I guess the only way to explain my decision
translation.zh: ‎我猜我这个决定唯一的解释

translation.en: is that it isn't my time to come home yet.
translation.zh: ‎就是现在还不到我回家的时候吧

translation.en: What's it look like I'm doing, Doc?
You walk out of here, Captain, you'll be AWOL.
translation.zh: ‎上尉 你走出这里就算是擅离职守

translation.en: [Sparks] I know you want me home. Make no mistake, I wanna be home.
translation.zh:
‎我知道你想让我回家
‎不要误会 我也想回家

translation.en: I wanna hold my son in my arms
and lay with you on a quiet desert night beneath the stars.
translation.zh:
‎在夜晚的星空下
‎和你一起躺在静静的沙漠里

translation.en: But I owe something to a group of men.
and now I know as well as I know myself.
translation.zh: ‎但现在我对他们就像对自己一样了解

translation.en: If I came home, I could never live with myself,
translation.zh:
‎我知道我欠他们
‎要是视而不见 现在回家的话

translation.en: knowing I owed a debt to them and ignored it.
So I have to complete this journey I've started.
translation.zh:
‎所以我必须完成
‎我已经开始的这段旅程

translation.en: Anything less would leave a hole in my conscience
translation.zh: ‎否则我的良心会留下一个洞

translation.en: I was just released from a hospital in North Africa, sir.
translation.zh: ‎我刚刚从北非一家医院出来 长官

translation.en: I was hoping to be reassigned to my old company.
translation.zh: ‎我希望能重新分配到之前的连

translation.en: What happened to your orders, Captain?

translation.zh: ‎我不喜欢那份命令 长官

translation.en: They were to send me home.
Mary, I don't expect you to understand.
translation.zh: ‎玛丽 我不指望你能理解

translation.en: I'm having a hard time understanding it myself.
But I have never been more sure of anything in my life
translation.zh: ‎但我人生中从未有过如此肯定的感觉

translation.en: and I have to trust that.
Get back to your foxhole, soldier. That's an order.
translation.zh: ‎回你的散兵坑 士兵 这是命令

translation.en: What are you looking at, Sergeant?
♪ Hearts are breaking All the way to hell ♪
♪ Distant voice you might have heard ♪
